channel.title: Teleporting from emote tab
channel.description:
OK so im using xbox scape's source and client and i wanted to know how to make it so when i click on a emote on the emote list it teleports somewere so look.
[URL=http://img14.imageshack.us/my.php?image=iiildm.jpg][IMG]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/1048/iiildm.jpg[/img][/URL]
so i want the portals to teleport to the portals area and the empty to teleport to the train area.
